parameters.name: DocType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: CallbackFcnAndModule
parameters.description: Callback function and module for this menu item as specified when the menu item was added; see IFrame::AddMenuItem2

title: ISldWorks.RemoveMenu
description: Removes a menu item from the specified document frame.
signature:
System.Boolean RemoveMenu( 
   System.Int32
DocType
,
   System.String
MenuItemString
,
   System.String
CallbackFcnAndModule
)

parameters.name: DocType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: CallbackFcnAndModule
parameters.description: Callback function and module for this menu item as specified when the menu item was added; see IFrame::AddMenuItem2

returns: True if the menu item was removed successfully, false if not
remarks:
When a menu item is added with
ISldWorks::AddMenuItem4
or
IFrame::AddMenu
, the document type for which the menu appears is specified. The DocType argument for this method must match the one used when the menu was created.
